statements: SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM projects WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name, budget FROM projects ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT project_name, budget FROM projects WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM projects WHERE project_id > 10 ORDER BY start_date DESC, budget ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM projects WHERE project_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY project_name ASC, project_id DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM projects WHERE budget < 5000 AND start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY budget DESC, start_date ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2023-01-01' OR end_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY end_date DESC, budget ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM projects WHERE start_date = '2022-06-15' OR budget = 10000 ORDER BY project_name ASC, project_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM expenses
SELECT expense_id, amount FROM expenses WHERE project_id = 1
SELECT project_id, amount, expense_date FROM expenses WHERE amount > 100
SELECT * FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC
SELECT project_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM expenses GROUP BY project_id
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE project_id = 1 ORDER BY expense_date DESC
SELECT expense_id, amount, expense_date FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000 AND project_id = 2
SELECT project_id, SUM(amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY project_id HAVING total_expenses > 5000
SELECT * FROM budgets ORDER BY remaining_budget ASC
SELECT project_id, total_budget - remaining_budget AS spent_budget FROM budgets WHERE project_id = 3
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, budget, start_date FROM projects WHERE budget > 10000;
SELECT project_id, project_name, budget, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 500 ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, member_name, member_role FROM projects JOIN team_members ON projects.project_id = team_members.project_id;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_name = 'Project A'
SELECT project_name, budget FROM projects ORDER BY budget DESC
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE budget > 5000
SELECT project_name, COUNT(*) AS total_expenses FROM projects LEFT JOIN expenses ON projects.project_id = expenses.project_id GROUP BY project_name
SELECT member_name, member_role FROM team_members WHERE project_id IN (SELECT project_id FROM projects WHERE budget > 10000)
SELECT * FROM project_expenses WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT expense_amount, expense_type FROM project_expenses WHERE expense_type LIKE 'Office%';
SELECT project_id, budget_amount FROM project_budgets ORDER BY budget_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE member_role = 'Manager' LIMIT 3;
SELECT project_id, approval_status FROM expense_approval WHERE approval_status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM project_expenses;
SELECT project_id, expense_type, expense_amount FROM project_expenses ORDER BY expense_amount DESC;
SELECT project_id, expense_type, expense_amount, expense_date FROM project_expenses WHERE expense_type = 'Travel' AND expense_amount > 1000;
SELECT project_id, expense_type, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM project_expenses GROUP BY project_id HAVING total_expenses > 5000;

SELECT team_members.member_name, team_members.member_role, project_expenses.expense_amount FROM team_members JOIN project_expenses ON team_members.member_id = project_expenses.project_id ORDER BY expense_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, budget FROM projects WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM projects WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, budget FROM projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, category, amount FROM projects JOIN expenses ON projects.project_id = expenses.project_id WHERE category = 'Marketing';

SELECT project_name, team_members.name AS member_name, team_members.role FROM project_team JOIN projects ON project_team.project_id = projects.project_id JOIN team_members ON project_team.member_id = team_members.member_id WHERE projects.project_id = 1;
SELECT projects.project_name, SUM(expenses.amount) AS total_expenses FROM projects JOIN expenses ON projects.project_id = expenses.project_id GROUP BY projects.project_name;
